reviews.text: We have stayed at the Bay Apartments many times and have never had a bad experience. The advantages of the property are its location (short walk to the Beaches, Coolangatta restaurants, Tweed River etc), the fact units are fully self contained, on site manager, literally 5 mins by taxi from the Airport and best of all the pool is one of the best in the area. Thoroughly recommended for a stay!
reviews.title: Great for Families and Great Location
Most lovely people
reviews.text: I never actually got to stay at theses apartments so this is a bit of a cheat. However i did book to do so on the phone and spoke to the lady who runs them. she was incredibly helpful with all my enquiries (as i know nothing about australia) and gave me all sorts of help and advise. In the end i had to cancel my booking a few days after i'd made it and she was lovely about it, and didn't charge me.

This was the 4th time we have stayed here and as usual it was absolutely fantastic. The onsite managers are extremely friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome. The unit itself was very clean and spacious. It even had a DVD player and pay TV for free.
reviews.title: The Bay Apartments - Perfect as Usual

reviews.text: The location is great - a one minute walk to beautiful Rainbow Bay Beach but far enough away from the noise of the beach itself. Within an easy walking distance to Coolangatta and Tweed Heads. We will definitely come back next year.
reviews.title: A quiet spot to stay
An oasis in Coolangatta
reviews.text: Coolangatta has to be one of the under rated places to stay on the Gold Coast. The beaches of this area, Coolangatta and Rainbow Bay have to be the most picturesque in the region providing safe patrolled swimming for chidren and adults alike and awesome surf for the more adventurous.

reviews.title: Excelent Service
reviews.text: Great accommodation, very friendly and helpfull managers, good facilities, great for the family - the best place we have stayed at in Rainbow Bay
